    • Method Detail

      • configure

        public void configure(org.apache.commons.configuration.Configuration configuration)
               throws org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException
        Description copied from interface: NetworkModel

        Configures the NetworkModel with a given Configuration instance. Note that the configuration objects should be provided by each network model instance and accessed using @ NetworkModel#getConfiguration()}.

        Specified by:
        configure in interface NetworkModel
        Parameters:
        configuration - a configuration with the appropriate parameters for the network model to run.
        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException - an exception that should be thrown if the passed configuration contains an invalid configuration (missing parameters or invalid parameter values)

      • configure

        public void configure(int numNodes,
             int k,
             double p,
             long seed)
               throws org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException
        Description copied from interface: WSModel
        Configures this model to generate a small-world network with a given number of nodes.
        Specified by:
        configure in interface WSModel
        Parameters:
        numNodes - number of nodes in the generated network
        k - minimum degree for the initial seed network
        p - re-wiring probability 0<=p<1 this is used to generate a network between a k-regular network and a random network.
        seed - the seed to be used in the random number generator of this model
        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException - if the model is not correctly configured.
